      • Dungeon

        public Dungeon​(int lvl,
               int seed,
               int enemType,
               boolean boss)
        Parameters:
        lvl - the level of the dungeon you want
        seed - the seed you want to generate a specific dungeon
        enemType - if you want to specify an enemy type PRDF_GOBLINS/DEMONS/SNOODLE
        boss - boss is enabled (default=true)
